comments: Rozier (CHA) immediately slides his hand off of Turner's (IND) side and marginal contact occurs during the pick.
Hayward (CHA) briefly clasps and immediately releases Mathurin's (IND) arm and marginal contact occurs as they engage off-ball.
Turner (IND) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.
Nembhard (IND) reaches in and marginal contact occurs with Rozier's (CHA) body as they come together during the drive.
Rozier (CHA) touches the ball last before going out of bounds.
Washington (CHA) reaches in and avoids making contact with Nesmith's (IND) arm as he defends during the drive.
Nembhard (IND) reaches in and initiates illegal contact with Hayward's (CHA) arm during his driving shot attempt.
Turner (IND) steps forward and establishes himself in Rozier's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact as the pick is set.
Richards (CHA) swipes down and initiates contact with Nembhard's (IND) arm that affects his driving shot attempt.
Mathurin (IND) jumps from point A to point B and makes contact with Hayward's (CHA) body that affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Hayward (CHA) avoids making body contact with Nesmith (IND) after the release as he contests the jump shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) swipes down and initiates contact with Mathurin's (IND) arm that affects his FOM.
Nembhard (IND) reaches in and initiates contact with Hayward's (CHA) arm that affects his SQBR.
Mathurin (IND) reaches in and marginal arm contact with Oubre Jr. (CHA) arm as the two come together.
Smith Jr. (CHA) legally contests Hield's (IND) jump shot attempt.
